hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Dodongo's Cavern# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Deku Stick# can be found in #Goron City#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #the Stone of Agony#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that plundering #Hyrule Field# is a foolish choice.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: One who does not have Triforce can't go in.

GC (Maze).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #an Ocarina#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that #chests past Dark Link# in the Water Temple hold...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #the Water Temple Boss Key#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Purple Rupee#.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Huge Rupee#.

HC (Malon).text: They say that ##the Death Mountain Crater## has #4# major items.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that ##Lon Lon Ranch## has #1# major item.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that plundering #Jabu Jabu's Belly# is a foolish choice.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Wallet#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #the Forest Temple# is on the way of the hero.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that inside #Jabu Jabu#, one can find #Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that #the Water Temple# hoards #Arrows (10 pieces)#.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that a spider high #above the icy waters# holds #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that at the #back of the Graveyard#, there is #inside Ganon's Castle#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #the Fire Arrows#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Red Rupee#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that inside the #Royal Family Tomb#, you will find...^ #a Strength Upgrade# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that at the #Bombchu Bowling Alley#, you will be rewarded with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #a Blue Rupee#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that #Zelda's Lullaby# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 4 Top

LW (Bridge).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #a Purple Rupee#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #the Gerudo Card# can be found at #Zora's Fountain#.

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

SFM (Maze Upper).text: They say that #Kokiri Forest# is on the path to #the Key#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that Sheik dispelled the barrier around #Ganon's Tower#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that a #village well# leads to #the Water Temple#.

ToT (Left-Center).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #a Wallet#.

ToT (Right).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Piece of Heart# and #Arrows (30 pieces)#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Map of the Spirit Temple# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ZF (Fairy).text: They say that #the Death Mountain Crater# is on the way of the hero.

ZF (Jabu).text: Did you know that the solution to the Truth Spinner in Shadow Temple is never one of the two positions closest to the initial position?

ZR (Near Domain).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Red Rupee#.

ZR (Near Grottos).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

ZR (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Deku Shield#.
